newsitem.title: GERMANY: German Q4 real GDP unchanged vs Q3 - Bundesbank.
newsitem.headline: German Q4 real GDP unchanged vs Q3 - Bundesbank.

text.p: Real German GDP was unchanged in the fourth quarter of 1996 versus the third quarter at 770.4 billion marks, the Bundesbank said on Thursday.
The Bundesbank gave the following details of Q4 1996 GDP data: PAN-GERMAN GDP Q4 96 Q3 96 Q2 96

NOTE - The changes are calculated by Reuters from the Bundesbank GDP data. The figures are seasonally adjusted. Earlier the Federal Statistics Office gave the qtr/qtr figures but rounded to the nearest half pct point. Previously announced data in brackets.
